flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: ALTARIA dances and wheels through thensky among billowing, cotton-like clouds.nBy singing melodies in its crystal-clearfvoice, this POKéMON makes its listenersnexperience dreamy wonderment.
ALTARIA sings in a gorgeous soprano.nIts wings are like cotton clouds.nThis POKéMON catches updrafts with itsfbuoyant wings and soars way up intonthe wild blue yonder.
It hums in a beautiful soprano voice.nIt flies among white clouds in the bluensky. It launches intensely hot fireballsnfrom its mouth.
If you hear a beautiful melody trillingndeep among mountains far from people,nit is ALTARIA’s humming.
If you hear a beautiful melody trillingndeep among mountains far from people,nit is ALTARIA’s humming.
It looks like a fluffy cloud whennit is in flight. It hums with itsnsoprano voice.
It looks like a fluffy cloud whennit is in flight. It hums with itsnsoprano voice.
If it bonds with a person, it willngently envelop the friend with itsnsoft wings, then hum.
It flies gracefully through thensky. Its melodic humming makesnyou feel like you’re in a dream.
It flies gracefully through thensky. Its melodic humming makesnyou feel like you’re in a dream.
Il aime enlacer ses amis dans sesnailes cotonneuses et ronronner.
If it bonds with a person, it willngently envelop the friend with itsnsoft wings, then hum.
Il aime enlacer ses amis dans sesnailes cotonneuses et ronronner.
If it bonds with a person, it willngently envelop the friend with itsnsoft wings, then hum.
On sunny days, it flies freely throughnthe sky and blends into the clouds.nIt sings in a beautiful soprano.
On sunny days, it flies freely throughnthe sky and blends into the clouds.nIt sings in a beautiful soprano.
おおぞらを　ゆったりと　とぶ。nチルタリスの　うつくしい　ハミングをnきくと　うっとり　ゆめごこちだ。
넓은 하늘을 느긋하게 난다.n파비코리의 아름다운 콧노래를n들으면 황홀한 꿈을 꾸는 기분이다.
Il vole doucement dans le ciel. Ceux qui l’entendentnfredonner sont comme plongés dans un rêve.
Es schwebt gemächlich durch den Himmel.nSein wunderschönes Summen gibt einemndas Gefühl zu träumen.
Vuela pausadamente por el cielo azul. Su hermosontrino cautiva a todo aquel que lo escucha.
Volteggia elegante nel cielo. Canticchia soavemente,nmandando in onirica estasi chi lo ascolta.
It flies gracefully through the sky. Its melodicnhumming makes you feel like you’re in a dream.
大空を　ゆったりと　飛ぶ。nチルタリスの　美しい　ハミングをn聴くと　うっとり　夢心地だ。
はれたひ　わたぐもに　まぎれながらnおおぞらを　じゆうに　とびまわりnうつくしい　ソプラノで　うたう。
맑은 날 뭉게구름에 뒤섞이면서n넓은 하늘을 자유롭게 날아다니며n아름다운 소프라노로 노래한다.
Il vole librement en se cachant dans les nuages.nSon chant est digne de celui de la plus douée desnsopranos.
Bei gutem Wetter mischt es sich unter die Wolkennund genießt die Freiheit. Es hat eine entzückendenSopranstimme.
En días soleados, le gusta mezclarse con las nubesny disfrutar de la libertad del cielo mientras trina connvoz de soprano.
Nelle belle giornate, ama confondersi con le pochennuvole in cielo e cantare con una bellissima voce dinsoprano.
On sunny days, it flies freely through the sky andnblends into the clouds. It sings in anbeautiful soprano.
晴れた日　綿雲に　まぎれながらn大空を　自由に　飛び回りn美しい　ソプラノで　歌う。
わたぐもに　まぎれて　おおぞらを　まう。nすきとおった　こえで　メロディを　さえずればnみみにした　ものは　うっとり　ゆめごこち。
뭉게구름에 뒤섞여 넓은 하늘을 떠돈다.n맑은 목소리로 멜로디를 지저귀면n그 소리를 들은 자들은 꿈꾸는 듯한 기분이 된다.

Altaria danse et tournoie dans les cieux, au milieundes nuages gonflés et cotonneux. Ce Pokémon chantendes mélodies de sa voix cristalline pour offrir aux auditeursnune expérience merveilleuse et inoubliable.
Altaria tanzt und dreht sich in der Luft durch vielenSchäfchenwolken. Indem es mit seiner kristallklarennStimme Melodien singt, versetzt es seine Zuhörer innverträumtes Erstaunen.
Altaria baila y revolotea por el cielo entre ondeantes nubesnque parecen de algodón. Al entonar melodías con su vozncristalina, este Pokémon deja a sus oyentes embobados ynadmirados.
Altaria danza e volteggia nel cielo tra le nubi soffici comenbatuffoli di cotone. Cantando con la sua voce cristallina,nriesce a mandare in onirica estasi chi lo ascolta.
Altaria dances and wheels through the sky among billowing,ncotton-like clouds. By singing melodies in its crystal-clearnvoice, this Pokémon makes its listeners experience dreamynwonderment.
綿雲に　紛れて　大空を　舞う。n透き通った　声で　メロディを　さえずればn耳にした　ものは　うっとり　夢心地。
うつくしい　ソプラノで　うたう　ポケモン。nわたぐもの　ような　つばさで　じょうしょうnきりゅうを　うけて　おおぞらへ　まいあがる。
아름다운 소프라노 음색으로 노래하는 포켓몬이다.n솜구름 같은 날개로 상승기류를n타고 넓은 하늘로 날아오른다.
Altaria chante avec une magnifique voix de soprano. Ses ailesnressemblent à des nuages cotonneux. Ce Pokémon se laissenporter par les courants d’air ascendants et disparaît dansnle bleu du ciel.
Altaria hat eine tolle Sopran-Stimme. Seine Flügel sehen ausnwie Schäfchenwolken. Dieses Pokémon stürzt sich in einennAufwind und steigt in den Himmel empor.

Altaria canta de maravilla, como una soprano. Tiene unas alasnque parecen nubes de algodón. Este Pokémon aprovecha lasncorrientes ascendentes y remonta el vuelo con sus flamantesnalas hacia la inmensidad del cielo azul.
Altaria canta con una sublime voce di soprano. Le sue alinspumeggianti, che sembrano nubi di cotone, gli consentonondi sfruttare le correnti ascensionali e di risalire verso l’infinitoncielo blu.
Altaria sings in a gorgeous soprano. Its wings are like cottonnclouds. This Pokémon catches updrafts with its buoyant wingsnand soars way up into the wild blue yonder.
美しい　ソプラノで　歌う　ポケモン。n綿雲の　ような　翼で　上昇n気流を　受けて　大空へ　舞い上がる。
